title: Weather Watch, Smart WatchFace
summary: Appointments, hourly forecast & more, a glance away! Now with weather app!
developerAddress:
IRIS Innovations
234 Graham St., Ste 201
Sewickley, PA 15143
description: (Formerly Smart WatchFace - Wx/Calendar)Everything you'd want your smartwatch to tell you, in a quick glance. Face your day with everything you need right on your wrist:+ Each hour marker shows the sun or moon with forecast cloud coverage, and different animated graphics for light, medium and heavy rain and snow. Scattered showers are shown coming only from some of the clouds. Lightning is added if in the forecast.+ See appointments for the next 12 hours around the outside.+ Hour markers when the sun has set also show the actual moon phase photos.+ Sunrise and sunset at the watch's location can be marked on the dial.+ Included "Weather Watch" Android Wear app, which shows weather depiction around the outside, like the watch face, but with zoomed up graphics and more forecast details at the center for the selected hour. Drag finger around "clock" face to explore the local forecast hour by hour. Shows exact temperature (choose °C or °F), precipitation type and probability.+ Set amount of time to keep full display on before going back to ambient mode, should be standard setting in Android Wear!+ Day and date displays are optional, and can be re-positioned.+ Battery level meters (optional) for both watch and phone, can be shown on graphical meters or watch hands.+ Settings screen in Android Wear app lets you customize your views.+ 7 day FREE TRIAL of Global Hourly Weather forecasts: Hour markers are weather icons showing forecasts, distinguishing cloud coverage, thunderstorms, precipitation probability, intensity and type. Rain, snow and lightning are animated (just a little). (Permanent weather access can be purchased inexpensively to cover our costs with the weather providers. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.irisinnovations.watchfacewx )+ Weather access also includes optional colored ring or dots inside hour markers to show forecast temperatures over the next 12 hours. (See screenshots above for color key.)+ Experimental Charge Mode feature replaces ambient face with big, dim numerals when the watch is docked to the charger, so it can act as a desk clock.All features FREE except weather access, which we pay our providers for. Beyond the 7 day free trial, purchase of the Weather Watch Add-On will be required to continue using the forecast features (1 inexpensive purchase). Option in watch face settings screen in Android Wear app will take you to the correct item to purchase in the Android Play Store, or click here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.irisinnovations.watchfacewx )Please feel free to email comments and suggestions!Tip: Customization options are accessed from the paired mobile device in the Android Wear app. In the watch face selector, tapping the gear icon in the middle of the Smart WatchFace preview will open the settings screen.Requires Android Wear 5.0+ on watch
descriptionHTML:
(Formerly Smart WatchFace - Wx/Calendar)

Everything you'd want your smartwatch to tell you, in a quick glance. Face your day with everything you need right on your wrist:

+ Each hour marker shows the sun or moon with forecast cloud coverage, and different animated graphics for light, medium and heavy rain and snow. Scattered showers are shown coming only from some of the clouds. Lightning is added if in the forecast.

+ See appointments for the next 12 hours around the outside.

+ Hour markers when the sun has set also show the actual moon phase photos.

+ Sunrise and sunset at the watch's location can be marked on the dial.

+ Included "Weather Watch" Android Wear app, which shows weather depiction around the outside, like the watch face, but with zoomed up graphics and more forecast details at the center for the selected hour. Drag finger around "clock" face to explore the local forecast hour by hour. Shows exact temperature (choose °C or °F), precipitation type and probability.

+ Set amount of time to keep full display on before going back to ambient mode, should be standard setting in Android Wear!

+ Day and date displays are optional, and can be re-positioned.

+ Battery level meters (optional) for both watch and phone, can be shown on graphical meters or watch hands.

+ Settings screen in Android Wear app lets you customize your views.

+ 7 day FREE TRIAL of Global Hourly Weather forecasts: Hour markers are weather icons showing forecasts, distinguishing cloud coverage, thunderstorms, precipitation probability, intensity and type. Rain, snow and lightning are animated (just a little). (Permanent weather access can be purchased inexpensively to cover our costs with the weather providers. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.irisinnovations.watchfacewx )

+ Weather access also includes optional colored ring or dots inside hour markers to show forecast temperatures over the next 12 hours. (See screenshots above for color key.)

+ Experimental Charge Mode feature replaces ambient face with big, dim numerals when the watch is docked to the charger, so it can act as a desk clock.

All features FREE except weather access, which we pay our providers for. Beyond the 7 day free trial, purchase of the Weather Watch Add-On will be required to continue using the forecast features (1 inexpensive purchase). Option in watch face settings screen in Android Wear app will take you to the correct item to purchase in the Android Play Store, or click here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.irisinnovations.watchfacewx )

Please feel free to email comments and suggestions!

Tip: Customization options are accessed from the paired mobile device in the Android Wear app. In the watch face selector, tapping the gear icon in the middle of the Smart WatchFace preview will open the settings screen.

Requires Android Wear 5.0+ on watch
comments: Not working properly The app loads and shows you the weather for the next several hours as designed, but does not display notification cards of any type. It doesn't display cards or vibrate when you receive a text, call, email or notification of any kind.

recentChanges: + All this info was hard to digest in 5 seconds sometimes -- added setting to control how many seconds watch waits before returning to ambient mode. Should be standard setting in Android Wear!
+ Add several color options for charge mode digits
+ More appearance options, including brushed metal backgrounds, mother of pearl, ...
